definition: a period of time/phase/stage/classifier for issues of a periodical, courses of study/time/term/period/to hope/Taiwan pr. [qi2]
full moon/to hope/to expect/to visit/to gaze (into the distance)/to look towards/towards
value/(to be) worth/to happen to/to be on duty

sentences.english: Unpractical expectations make some students disappointed in their college life.
sentences.chinese: 不切實際的期望值使部份學生對大學生活感到失望。

sentences.english: Customer the satisfaction is to feel to know ther es ult with the difference function that expect worth.
sentences.chinese: 顧客滿意是可感知效果和期望值之間的差異函數。

sentences.english: Unfortunately the person who usually sets up their expectation hasn't turned up.
sentences.chinese: 不幸地是，那個通常給他們安設期望值的人還沒來。
丹麥人對生活的期望值很低。

sentences.english: Results The most required item was to guide the training of self-care(99.3%).
sentences.chinese: 結果患者對指導自理能力訓練期望值達99。

sentences.english: One key difference Wang cited was expectations.
sentences.chinese: 王星提到的一個關鍵區別就是畢業生的期望值。

sentences.english: Our sources of pleasure change our expectations too.
sentences.chinese: 我們快樂的源頭也改變了我們的期望值。

sentences.english: Instead, what I am striving to do is set expectations.
sentences.chinese: 相反，我所努力做的是設立期望值。

sentences.english: Survey respondents reported that cloud adopters have realized these expectations in actual results.
sentences.chinese: 受訪者表示雲採納者已經意識到實際結果中的期望值。

sentences.english: The weighted mean of the random variable is the expected value.
sentences.chinese: 隨機變量的加權平均值是期望值。

sentences.english: Then look at what we expect from a modern government.
sentences.chinese: 再看看我們對一個現代政府的期望值。

sentences.english: Once again, this comes back to the expectations of users.
sentences.chinese: 這再次回到了用戶的期望值問題上。

sentences.english: Since this is a concave function, it's not just the expected value.
sentences.chinese: 由於這是一個凹函數，並不只是期望值。

sentences.english: Moreover, their expectations of beauty may rise, says Hullett.
sentences.chinese: 此外，她們對美的期望值也會增加，哈里特說。

sentences.english: The formulas of expectation and variance of degree of consolidation for sa nd-drained ground are obtained.
sentences.chinese: 推導了砂井地基固結度期望值和方差的計算公式。

sentences.english: Average consumers have very, very high expectations about search engines.
sentences.chinese: 普通用戶，對於搜索引擎有很高的期望值。

definition: attitude (of the heart)/state of one's psyche/way of thinking/mentality
